name: Larry BISHOP Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Bishop v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Larry BISHOP Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 3rd day of June, 1998, this matter is held pending this Court’s disposition of Rogers v. Pa. Board of Probation and Parole, 8 M.D.App. Dkt.1997.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
713 A.2d 614
Larry BISHOP Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 3, 1998.
